questions.question: 1. Protein is used by the body to
2. Carbohydrates are used by the body to

choices.answer: make important chemicals such as enzymes and antibodies

questions.question: 3.Fat is used by the body for which two of the following functions:

choices.answer: make important chemicals such as enzymes and antibodies

questions.question: 4. Which of the following are naturally occurring and can be obtained from plants and animals?
5. Which of the following are naturally occurring and can be obtained from soil and water?
6. Which nutrient helps to keep food moving easily through the alimentary canal?
7. Which "nutrient" typically makes up 60-70% of the body?
8. Foods which are good sources of protein include:

choices.answer: fish, meat, beans, eggs and dairy

questions.question: 9. Foods which are good sources of carbohydrates include:

choices.answer: fish, meat, beans, eggs and dairy

questions.question: 10. Foods which are good sources of fat include:

choices.answer: fish, meat, beans, eggs and dairy

questions.question: 11. Foods which are good sources of vitamins and minerals include:

choices.answer: fish, meat, beans, eggs and dairy

questions.question: 12. To test whether or not a food contains starch:

choices.answer: If the iodine turns from blue/black to yellow/brown, it contains starch.
If the iodine turns from yellow/brown to blue/black, it contains starch.
If the bluish mixture changes to red upon heating, it contains starch(B.T)
If the reddish/brown mixture changes to blue upon heating, contains starch

questions.question: 13. To test whether or not a food contains sugar:

choices.answer: If the iodine turns from blue/black to yellow/brown, it contains sugar.
If the iodine turns from yellow/brown to blue/black, it contains sugar.
If the bluish mixture changes to red upon heating, it contains sugar(B.TEST
If the reddish/brown mixture changes to blue upon heating, contains sugar

questions.question: 14. Having a "balanced diet" means a diet that:

choices.answer: has equal amounts of carbohydrates, protein, fats and sugars, fruits...
provides nutrients with the right amount of energy your body uses each day
takes in an equal amount of food as water consumed
eating as much fruits and vegetables as KFC chicken and fries

questions.question: Which part of the digestive system uses hydrochloric acid to kill micro-organisms in food to break down protein?
